title: Motion sense not working in Lebanon
content:
I have just recently updated from Pixel 2 to Pixel 4 xl and motion sense isn't working at all and displaying this (Motion Sense features like Quick Gestures, show display when nearby, and reach to check phone are not supported in this country) 
I really need to find a way to make it operate
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
